implementer.label: The applicant, that created request to change of assigned roles

implementers.label: Implementers
implementers.placeholder: Users in IdM who will implement requests

implementerRoles.label: Roles of implementers
implementerRoles.placeholder: Users in the IdM who have assigned these roles will implement requests

createDefaultRole.label: Create default role
createDefaultRole.placeholder: As part of the creation of the virtual system, a new role will be created to assign this system.

roleName.label: Code of default role
roleName.placeholder: If the role for that code already exists, then existing role will be used to map this system.

create.message: To create a new virtual system, fill its name and choose implementers:

realize.message: Do you want to mark the request [{{record}}] as implemented?
realize.message_plural:
Selected requests: [{{records}}].

Do you want to mark the {{count}} selected requests as implemented?
realize.error: An error occurred while resolving the request
realize.success: Selected request [{{record}}] was successfully marked as implemented
realize.success_plural: Selected requests [{{records}}] were successfully marked as implemented

cancel.message: Do you want to cancel the request [{{record}}]?
cancel.message_plural:
Selected requests: [{{records}}].

Do you want to cancel the {{count}} selected requests?
cancel.error: An error occurred while canceling the request [{{record}}]

detail.basic: Detail of the request for implementation
detail.title: $t(vs:content.vs-request.detail.header)

alert.accountShouldBeDeleted: The account is to be deleted from the target system.
alert.accountShouldBeCreated: The account is to be created on the target system.

vs-request-by-implementer-evaluator.help: Permissions for VS requests by the system implementer.

vs-system-generator-long-running-task.label: Generate requested number of virtual systems (for optimization testing only)
vs-system-generator-long-running-task.help: Task for optimization testing only. Generate requested number of virtual systems and evenly assign the number of users to them.

item-prefix.label: Item prefix
item-prefix.help: Prefix common to all created items for their better recognition.

identity-count.label: User count
identity-count.help: Nuber of users to which the generated systems are evenly assigned.

role-count.label: Role count
role-count.help: Number of roles, which are evenly assigned to generated users.

vs-request-cancel-bulk-action.label: Cancel the request
vs-request-cancel-bulk-action.help: Cancel selected requests on the virtual system. The operation does not affect other parts of the IdM. Ie. for example, if you want to prevent the same request from being recreated, you must remove the role that this system assigns to that identity.

reason.label: Reason for rejection
reason.placeholder: Fill in the reason for rejection ...

VS_REQUEST_DELETING_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST.title: Account [{{uid}}] on the target system cannot be deleted
VS_REQUEST_DELETING_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST.message: Account [{{uid}}] on the target system cannot be deleted, because it was not found. Make sure you first resolved the 'create' request for the account!

VS_REQUEST_UPDATING_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST.title: Account [{{uid}}] on the target system cannot be updated
VS_REQUEST_UPDATING_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST.message: Account [{{uid}}] on the target system cannot be updated, because it was not found. Make sure you first resolved the 'create' request for the account!

VS_IMPLEMENTER_WAS_NOT_FOUND.title: Implementer for the virtual system was not found!
VS_IMPLEMENTER_WAS_NOT_FOUND.message: Implementer [{{implementer}}] for the virtual system was not found!

VS_IMPLEMENTER_ROLE_WAS_NOT_FOUND.title: Implementer`s role for the virtual system was not found!
VS_IMPLEMENTER_ROLE_WAS_NOT_FOUND.message: Implementer`s role [{{role}}] for the virtual system was not found!

VS_REQUEST_REALIZE_WRONG_STATE.title: Request on the virtual system cannot be implemented!
VS_REQUEST_REALIZE_WRONG_STATE.message: Request can be implemented only if it is in the state [{{state}}]. But this request is in the state [{{currentState}}]!

VS_REQUEST_CANCEL_WRONG_STATE.title: Request on the virtual system cannot be canceled!
VS_REQUEST_CANCEL_WRONG_STATE.message: Request can be canceled only if it is in the state [{{state}}]. But this request is in the state [{{currentState}}]!

VS_SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_REQUEST.title: Virtual system cannot be deleted!
VS_SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_REQUEST.message: Virtual system [{{system}}] cannot be deleted, because it has some unresolved requests!

ROLE_REQUEST_VS_REQUEST_REJECTED.title: Request on the virtual system was rejected!
ROLE_REQUEST_VS_REQUEST_REJECTED.message: Request on the virtual system [{{system}}] was rejected!

ROLE_REQUEST_VS_REQUEST_IN_PROGRESS.title: Some requests on a virtual systems are not resloved!
ROLE_REQUEST_VS_REQUEST_IN_PROGRESS.message: Some requests on this vritual systems [{{systems}}] are not resloved!

VS_SYSTEM_GENERATOR_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISS.title: Insufficient permission.
VS_SYSTEM_GENERATOR_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISS.message: Only administrator is allowed to run this task.
